metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2413 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: media/libmedia/IOMX.cpp in mediaserver in Android 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.xbefore 5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-04-01 does not initialize a handlepointer, which allows attackers to gain privileges via a craftedapplication, as demonstrated by obtaining Signature or SignatureOrSystemaccess, aka internal bug 26403627.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
